excludeLangs.name: Exclude language list
excludeLangs.desc: The languages in the list will be ignored and not processed

codeFontSize.name: Font size of code block
codeFontSize.desc: Change the font size of the code block (recommended values are 16px or 14px). The line numbers are calculated, and modifying the font size may cause misalignment of the line numbers.

useContextMenu.name: Use context-menu
useContextMenu.desc: Enhance the right-click menu for code blocks

showLineNumber.name: Display line numbers
showLineNumber.desc: After enabling, line numbers will be displayed

linenumFontColor.name: Line number font color
linenumFontColor.desc: Set the font color of the line numbers, like `#ed9c9fcc/rgba(237,156,159,0.8)/var(--code-normal)`

linenumHighlightColor.name: Line highlight color
linenumHighlightColor.desc: Set the line highlight color, like `#FFFF001A/rgba(255, 255, 0, 0.1)`

showLangName.name: Display language names
showLangName.desc: After enabling, the language names will be displayed at the top

showCollapseBtn.name: Display the collapse button
showCollapseBtn.desc: After enabling, code blocks can be collapsed

showCodeSnap.name: Display the code snap button
showCodeSnap.desc: After enabling, you can take screenshots of the code blocks

settings.desc: Some settings only take effect after reopening the page or restarting Obsidian.

linenumHoverMode.name: On hover
linenumHoverMode.desc: Behavior when hovering over the line number

linenumClickMode.name: On click
linenumClickMode.desc: Behavior when clicking the line number

enableLinkPasteModal.name: Enhance link pasting
enableLinkPasteModal.desc: In editing mode, pasting links will present different processing options for selection

enableLinenumContextMenu.name: Line number context menu
enableLinenumContextMenu.desc: Right-clicking the line number displays the context menu.
